narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Michael Marshall is a Social Worker, Clinical provider based in Waterford, CT. From 2019-09 through 2020-07, this provider received $203K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 858 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 87% of billing is concentrated in 90837 (90837), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2020-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
